title: Mum's warning as girl chased by man saying "want to play a little game with me?"
text:

A mum has chillingly warned other parents after her 14-year-old daughter was chased down an alley by a man saying "do you want to play a little game with me?".

Kerry Robinson said her teenage daughter Miah was chased by the tall, hooded man after his frightening words.

Kerry, from Devon, said: "Miah had been walking home from her friend's house which is less than five minutes away.

"She was walking towards an alleyway which runs between Washbrook View and Butt's Road when she noticed a man.

"He wasn't going anywhere and looked like he was just wandering around."

As Miah entered the alleyway the man started shouting at her, reports Devon Live.

Kerry said: "He shouted 'Oi, you want to play a little game with me?' and then started running towards her.

"Her instinct kicked in and she ran away as fast as she could.

"We think the man stopped chasing her when he saw her go towards the area where the houses are.

"She managed to get home, told me what had happened and we called the police."

Miah couldn't see the man's face as it was partially covered by a hood.

Kerry said: "She couldn't give his age but said it was definitely a man wearing a big, dark coat with a hood covering half his face.

"She said he was around 6ft in height and wearing baggy, dark coloured jogger bottoms."

Kerry said the incident has left Miah very shaken and scared.

She said: "You never think anything like this will happen, particularly somewhere like Ottery - it's so safe here.

"The police are coming round to speak to us about the incident later today.

"I wanted to warn other parents in the area in case this man is still around.

"There's a lot of children around here and with Halloween coming up I think it's important people are vigilant."

A spokesman for Devon and Cornwall Police said: "Police were notified at around 8pm to reports of a teenage girl being shouted at by an unknown man on Ridgeway in Ottery St Mary. The girl left the scene and continued home.

"Officers are to visit address later today to ascertain more details."

Anyone with information is asked to contact police on 101 quoting CR 657/241019.
description: Kerry Robinson said her 14-year-old daughter, Miah, was chased by the tall, hooded man after his frightening words in Ottery St Mary, Devon
